span.span: The name of the member to invoke.

param.name: flags

param.span: 对其调用成员的对象。

span.span: This must be the current script object.

param.name: args

span.span: This is an empty array if there are no parameters.

param.span: 长度与 参数相同的数组。

span.span: An array that has the same length as the parameter.

span.span: An array of parameters.

summary.span: 调用元素类型或 类类型的指定成员。

span.span: Invokes the specified member of the element type or the class type.
The return value of the call to the member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以使用后期绑定调用数组元素类型上的成员。This method can use late binding to invoke the member on the element type of the array.

summary.span: 获取 对象的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the object.
The type of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取对象本身的类型 ，而不是类型化数组的元素类型。This property gets the type of the object itself, not the element type of the typed array.
